Class HostileCharacter

java.lang.Object
  Character
      HostileCharacter

public class HostileCharacter
extends Character

A character in the game which is capable of fighting, primarily enemies

                        int s,

Constructs a HostileCharacter with the appropriate parameters

Parameters:
name - The character's name
s - The character's strength
a - The character's agility
d - The character's defense
h - The character's maximum health, which also sets their current health
aM - What the character says/does while attacking
